=Banyan VINES IP=
  * EtherType is {{{0x0bad}}}
  * Currently supported by [http://www.wireshark.org Wireshark]
=LANtastic=
  * EtherType is {{{0x81d7}}}
  * Currently not supported by [http://www.wireshark.org Wireshark]
  * Also makes use of the UDP-based [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/NetBIOS#Datagram_distribution_service NetBIOS Datagram Service protocol]

=DEC DNA Routing=
  * EtherType is {{{0x6003}}}
  * Currently supported by [http://www.wireshark.org Wireshark]
